body.name: DBPOWER Native 1080P 5G 4K WiFi Projector, Upgrade 20000L 500 ANSI FHD Outdoor Movie Projector, Support 4P+4D Keystone/Zoom/PPT, 300" Portable Mini Video Projector Compatible w/Phone/Laptop/DVD/PC/TV
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 40 mins
features: [Real Native 1080P Resolution] DBPOWER RD828 Full HD 1080P Native projector utilizes the bright LED light and LCD display technology, with upgrade 20000 lumen 500 ansi high brightness, 10000:1 high contrast significantly provides over 60+% sharpness and brightness than other 1080p projector in the market and more colorful image for home entertainment. With native 1920x1080p resolution, 3 times of pixels than other 720p projectors, it's the most cost-effective 1080p projector.

[Latest WIFI Screen Sync Technology] DBPOWER RD828 portable wireless 1080p projector adapts the latest WIFI smart phone synchronize screen technology can easy connect your iOS/Android device by simply connecting your WIFI , no hassle of extra adapters and dongles will make screen sync come true. Especially when the home projector is suspended from the ceiling, RD828 wireless 1080p projector brings a Wireless Freedom to you.

[4-Point Keystone Correction & Zoom Function] The biggest feature of our RD828 1080p mini projector is the innovative 4-point keystone correction, an upgraded 4d keystone correction. 4d keystone can only adjust the vertical or horizontal directions, while the 4p keystone realizes that the 4 corners of the picture can all be adjusted separately, more practical, convenient and user-friendly. With zoom function, it can shrink the image size to -50% using the remote without moving the projector.

[Presentation via USB & Easily Upgrade System] DBPOWER RD828 wifi outdoor movie projector is the first LCD projector can play Microsoft office & Adobe PDF files directly from your USB stick and view them on the projector. While others only support text format and need to connect the projector to a laptop/PC to project Excel/Word/PDF. Unlike other projectors that can only be upgraded locally by plugging in a USB, 828 wireless mini projector supports both local and online upgrade methods.

[100000 hours lamp life & 3-YEAR WARRANTY]: DBPOWER RD828 wireless video projector adopt the latest sarcoma technology to minimize lamp power consumption to extend the useful life of the lamp to a maximum of 1000000 hours. This portable 1080p projector is very suitable for home movie entertainment, backyard, games, yoga, and party usage. Also backed by a 3-YEAR warranty, you have nothing to lose by purchasing it. Professional customer service and free tech support is available.
body.description: WIFI Connectivity with Smart Phone iOS/Android/Tablet Easily Connect Your Smart phone & Tablet to the Projector by WIFI, No Other Cables Needed! For IOS, Users：Connect your device and projector to the same Wi-Fi router, use iOS Cast function to sync screen your iOS device to the projector by two steps setting. (Notice: IOS 30P Interface Device cannot support.) For Android, Users：Connect your device and projector to the same Wi-Fi router, use Mira cast function to sync screen your android device to the projector by two steps setting. (Notice: It can only support Android 4.1 and up version. Wireless Technology: WIFI Display Compatible Device: IOS/Android Devices Brightness: Upgrade 20000L /Contrast: 10000:1 Native Resolution: 1920x1080P Speaker: 5W Dual HIFI Speaker

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DBPOWER RD828 Real Native 1080P WIFI Projector, Upgrade 20000 Lumen 500 ANSI, 10000:1, 300’’ Big Display Image Size, Best Choice for Home Cinema! Native 1920*1080P Resolution, Upgrade 20000 Lumens 500 ANSI Brightness, 10000:1 Contrast Ratio It delivers bright large-screen with fantastic image clarity, outstanding color accuracy and incredibly sharp image detail to both homes and businesses.Latest WIFI Smart Phone Synchronize Screen Technology It adopts the latest WIFI smart phone synchronize screen technology can easy connect your iOS/Android device by simply connecting your WIFI , no hassle of extra adapters and dongles will make screen sync come true.4-Point Keystone Correction Function (±50° for Four Angles) It is an upgraded 4D keystone correction function. Besides, it can digital zoom -50% is the preferred feature in this projector, with this innovative function, no need to adjust the projector distance frequently to matches the screen size.Presentation of PPT/Excel/Word/PDF Directly via USB No need to connect with PC, you can simply save your work onto the USB memory stick then plug it and you are ready to go. This is a very important technological innovation, provides business capabilities right out of the box. Notice: Due to HDCP copyright, this wireless projection doesn't support Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu, but you could use amazon fire stick. DBPOWER RD828 is mainly used for home cinema and small conference, not recommended for large business presentations or teaching. You will get the best effect with a dark environment.

Specifications: Image Tech: 5'' LCD TFT DisplayOptional Screen: 40"-300"Aspect Ratio: 4:3\16:9Lamp Type: LED Lamp, 100000 HrsVoltage:AC100-240V/50-60HzKeystone: 4D Digital Keystone CorrectionZoom: -50% Digital ZoomProjection Mode: Front-Desktop/Rear-Desktop/Front-Ceiling/Rear-Ceiling WIFI Connectivity with Smart Phone iOS/Android/Tablet Easily Connect Your Smart phone & Tablet to the Projector by WIFI, No Other Cables Needed! For IOS, Users：Connect your device and projector to the same Wi-Fi router, use iOS Cast function to sync screen your iOS device to the projector by two steps setting. (Notice: IOS 30P Interface Device cannot support.) For Android, Users：Connect your device and projector to the same Wi-Fi router, use Mira cast function to sync screen your android device to the projector by two steps setting. (Notice: It can only support Android 4.1 and up version. Wireless Technology: WIFI Display Compatible Device: IOS/Android Devices Brightness: Upgrade 20000L /Contrast: 10000:1 Native Resolution: 1920x1080P Speaker: 5W Dual HIFI Speaker

Wireless Screen Mirroring in Simple Steps-For iOS device: 1. Turn on WIFI on the settings icon from the main menu of the projector; 2. Select “iOS Cast” from the main menu; 3. Connect your iOS device to the same Wi-Fi router; 4. Turn on Screen Mirroring on your iOS device, select the projector device “DBPOWER-XXXX” and connect it ; Wireless Screen Mirroring in Simple Steps-For Android device: 1. Turn on WIFI on the settings icon from the main menu of the projector; 2. Select “Miracast” from the main menu; 3. Turn on Screen Mirroring on your Android device, search projector device “DBPOWER-XXXX” and connect it . NOTICE: 1. DBPOWER RD828 1080p wifi projector for phone can only support Mira-cast WiFi screen mirroring protocol. If you are using phone(Google/MOTO/Sony/Samsung ) that supports other protocols(Like Chrome-cast WiFi screen mirroring, It will occur no picture only audio works situation. You may need to use a wired connection or use another phone that with Mira-cast protocol. 2. Make sure connected to a good network environment, which the WiFi network should be greater than 50M. And prevent the WiFi stream gets overloaded with too many devices connected to it. The closer the projector is to the home router, the more stable the WiFi network connection will be.

High Brightness and Native 1080P Resolution Adopting the most advanced German LED lamp technology, it has an amazing +50% brightness and a native resolution of 1920 x 1080p full HD. When compared with other 1080p projectors, the difference is obvious. When connected with smartphone, it could support 4K videos. 10000:1 Contrast Ratio The higher the contrast ratio, the better the image color will be. With 10000:1 contrast ration, it will bring you nature close color, instead of wash out color as other low contrast ration projectors.

Innovative 4P/4D ±50° Keystone Correction Most 1080p projectors have vertical keystone correction only, or have 4D keystone correction(both horizontal and vertical). 4D keystone can only adjust the vertical or horizontal directions two choice, while the 4P Keystone Correction realizes that the 4 Angles of the picture can all be adjusted separately, more practical, convenient and user-friendly! 4P Keystone Correction makes it simple to project ideally aligned images from a variety of locations. With it, the projector can be placed off center, allowing the presenter to stand in front of the screen without blocking the image. Adjust in any direction, enjoy the freedom of simple! Multi Projector Mode You could flip the image in the settings. It can support front projection and back projection. It is recommended for those who want to save more space to mount it on the ceiling. (The specifications of the ceiling mounting screws are M5 * 10mm)

300" Giant Screen & 50% Zoom Function By moving the projector farther to the screen, the screen will become larger. You could get as large as 300 inches screen. The optimum projection distance is 3.3m with 100 inches screen. With a 50% Digital Zoom function, you can project on the wall at home and watch movies in any size you like. Office Software Compatible for Small Conference Different from other LED projector, this projector can read power point presentation, excel and word & Adobe PDF files directly from USB stick (2.0) and view them on the projector. It’s very convenient for small conference. No need to take heavy PC for meeting from now on. HiFi Stereo Audio Performance Built-in dual stereo speakers (5W) with SRS sound system. With double clear sound quality, the powerful speakers give you an immersive experience. Package Included:1x 1080P WIFI Projector/1X Remote Control/1x HDMI Cable/1x AV Cable/1X Adjustable Screw/1X User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE - Received Defective Unit, New One is Awesome
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE- The company reached out to me and sent me a new one, so I decided to review it fairly.I believe I received a defective unit, so I highly recommend everyone who purchases this item to test it properly, because a working one of these is great:***Upon opening the projector, you’re greeted by a very cute small backpack that opens all the way to reveal the projector and a few cables - hdmi, AV (I think), and the power cord. You also have a manual and a remote.The projector itself comes with a lens cap, and is absolutely amazing. You’re greeted with the home screen, which gives you access to each input, and the settings. I connected a Chromecast to this, but the screen share on it is amazing and reliable. I’m able to connect my phone within just a few seconds.The quality is definitely 1080p, and the focus is super easy. However, the part that stands out to me the most is keystone. I can put my projector anywhere in my room and keystone it so that it looks straight. This feature makes it so worth it, because it maintains the quality really well.In terms of brightness, the projector is pretty bright. At nighttime you might have to turn the brightness down, and you can see the screen in a light daylight, I’d definitely not recommend trying it in direct sunlight though.I watched a 3 hour movie and a few episodes of a show today, and it was great. No burning, no overheating, nothing. Only time will tell if it survives, but customer service is great to contact if you need any help or notice anything strange.The only thing I wish it had was Bluetooth, which can be solved with a Bluetooth adapter that plugs into the unit’s USB port.Regardless, for the price, this is definitely the best and simplest projector you can buy if you’re hosting a party outdoors, indoors, or just need something quick and easy.—old review below—I received this projector this afternoon and was so pleasantly surprised when opening it. It arrived in a whole backpack! I was stunned. I began removing the accessories, setting everything up, and turned it on. It was beautiful, especially the keystone correction was amazing.Then comes nighttime. I turned it back on with my friends to watch my first movie on it. In the middle of the movie, my friend closest to the projector said he smelled something funny. We all looked over at the projector to see it smoking from the vents. The screen began turning brown, so we quickly unplugged the projector and put it on the floor so it doesn’t burn our tableWhat started as such an amazing purchase turned into a disaster, in only a few hours. Looking at the other reviews I see similar things have happened after months of usage, but I also see so much positivity. Are these just defective units? I can’t imagine something that looked so promising can spontaneously combust. Now the projector shows brown all over the image, and I won’t keep it on for more than 2 minutes or else it heats up quickly.I really wish this worked for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Picture - Visible with Lights on and Sunlight in Room
reviews.reviewText: I have this projector mounted on a shelf across the room and hitting a wall without any special paints or screen. It shows up well even when it is light outside or the lights are on in the room. The picture is pretty good, and the included speaker works well enough if you are bringing it for traveling or a presentation. If not, just get a 3.5mm aux cable and run the sound to any speakers you want. The remote works really well, I can point it forward towards the screen and still control the projector even though it is above my head and behind me. My only complaint is that the markings have no backlight and don't glow in the dark so it can be difficult to see the remote when the lights are off.The 4-point keystone option in the projector's settings lets you adjust the image to unconventional spaces while keeping the proportions undistorted really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Sound ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Limited sound output options, but speakers are clear and loud for a projector of it’s class and adequate for a portable setup. Recommend using a sound-bar or other speakers for general use when possible. Using a Bluetooth adapter or streaming device such as Apple TV or something similar that is Bluetooth compatible is recommended both for sound and streaming purposes.Picture ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Overall picture quality and projection capability of 300 inches is fantastic for its class and price point! Contrast is greatHowever, where it lacks is the slightly limited ability to make adjustments to brightness and when using for gameplay or anything other than general movie/tv as well as generic functionality with other controls such as the keystone feature, menu and general operation.For optimal picture quality, a high quality white screen in a completely dark room will provide a fantastic viewing experience! If using outside or in a room without the ability to obtain complete darkness a Silver screen would be ideal for the best contrast and darkest blacks, this will slightly reduce brightness of vivid colors but most silver screens will give a gain of at least 1.3 helping to keep colors vivid and bright.Remote ⭐️⭐️⭐️The remote design is good to great, but has a delay and sometimes seems to not send a signal to the projector.Overall Value ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️User friendly, quick setup for portable use, clear and crips picture and sound. Up to 300 inch projection, and great viewing angle.If you don’t mind spending the money on a high end projector, that would be recommend! But if you are seeking a great projector with a limited budget this is a great option and very well worth its price! If you’re new to this hobby this is projector is the perfect option! But do yourself a favor and spend some time researching screen gain, types of screens and what your best option is based on how dark or light your viewing area will be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All I can say is WOW!!
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely impressed with the brightness of this low-cost projector! It connects to whatever media you’re using in multiple ways providing a convenient way to display presentations without spending hundreds and hundreds on some of the higher end models. Images are crisp and clear and the brightness in a fully lighted room was extremely impressive. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a less expensive option for presenting materials or simply having a fun family movie night!

reviews.reviewerName: Juan Ramón Medína HJuan Ramón Medína H
reviews.reviewTitle: Increíble calidad para tan bajo precio.
reviews.reviewText: Se ve espectacular! Quisiera tener alguna pared más grande para proyectar la imagen hasta en 300 pulgadas. Me encantó que da muy buen contraste, aún en paredes blancas. Estoy esperando una pantalla para proyección pero por lo pronto en la pared se ve de lujo, casi igual al cine! Me encantaría que tuviera un poquito más de brillo pero tampoco decepciona. Se nota que es full hd an cuanto enciende. Aprovechen que esta más barato aquí en Amazon México que en el Amazon americano. Anímense, no se van a decepcionar.

Muy bueno, me gustó mucho se percibe de buena calidad y material tiene buena calidad de imagen y brillo, aun con la luz que entra por las ventanas se ve muy bien.Incluye: control remoto, hdmi, RCA-3.5mm y energía. Se puede conectar inalambrico con el teléfono. El sonido no es muy alto pero suficiente y claro para una habitación, yo conecte sistema de audio adicional para mejorar la experiencia de cine :).Espero agregar pronto la pantalla de proyección para tener la experiencia máxima en casa.

Este proyector es excelente, yo lo compre para ver películas y de más en exterior… NO sirve de día en el exterior, pero en la noche tiene una excelente imagen, yo proyecto en aproximadamente 300” (6x4m)… lo único que no me gusto, es que la salida de audio saca la señal a un volumen MUY bajo… es mejor transmitir directo del dispositivo que alimente la imagen, a el sistema de sonido.

Llegó hoy, a tiempo, tiene muy buena calidad, muy bonito Design. La imagen clara aún con luz del día! Buscaba un proyector nuevo, pero hasta que encontré éste que une todos mis deseos, tiene Bluetooth, Wifi, Miracast instalado, bocinas buenas, HD de 1080 y un contraste de 10000:1 y eso se ve a la primera encendida! Hasta un filtro que se puede limpiar después de largo uso. Me encantó! Y estoy muy emocionada para ver mis pelis en grande y a buena calidad.

reviews.reviewTitle: Calidad y buen precio ya necesito darle mantenimiento
reviews.reviewText: Es mi primer proyector y me ha gustado mucho, muy buena imagen incluso de día con las persianas abiertas ya podré disfrutar de mis películas como en el cine conecte mi Xbox one funcionó muy muy bien
